title: Psychonauts 2 and Aliens: Fireteam Elite Reviews! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.23.21
description:
Blessing and Tim talk about Psychonoauts 2's excellent reviews, Aliens: Fireteam Elite, and Halo not launching with Co-op campaign and Forge.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:44 - Housekeeping
A new Xcast is up right now and it’s a jam packed episode talking about the Halo news, and a Twelve Minutes spoilercast featuring Mike Howard, Greg Miller, Kahlief Adams, Parris Lily, and Barrett Courtney.
It’s a BIG OLE week with Gamescom happening which means:
KFGD tomorrow is going live early at 9am PT BECAUSE...
Tomorrow we’ll be reacting live to Xbox’s Gamescom showcase at 10am PT right here on Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames
The post show to that will be your Kinda Funny Xcast this week.
Wednesday we’ll be reacting live to Gamescom Opening Night Live at 11am PT right here.
The Post Show to that will be your Kinda FUnny Gamescast for this week.
PS I Love You XOXO is going up on REDACTED instead of tomorrow BECAUSE that’ll be our preview of Deathloop and [REDACTED]
The Roper Report  -
00:05:57 - Psychonauts 2 Reviews are up!
00:21:09 - Another review round-up: Aliens Fireteam Elite
00:33:00 - Ad
00:36:02 - Halo Infinite won't have co-op Campaign and Forge at launch - Matt Brown @ Windows Central
00:44:30 - WWE 2K22 will release in March 2022 - Vikki Blake @ Eurogamer
00:49:12 - Hideo Kojima Says 12 Minutes makes him want to make another adventure game - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:52:00 - Out today
00:52:37 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg & Gary Whitta
